name: Warfun (DEMO)
description:
A fun multiplayer game with shooting and stuff. Customize, play alone or with friends!

Controls:

  • Keyboard
  1.  WASD to move
  2.  Use mouse to aim
  3.  Left click to shoot
  4.  Z to dash
  5.  Hold right click to charge for laser guns
  6.  Esc to pause
  • Gamepad/Joy-Con
  1.  Left stick to move
  2.  Right stick to aim
  3.  Right trigger to shoot
  4.  Left trigger to dash
  5.  Hold right trigger to charge
  6.  Start button to pause

How to download:

  1.  Extract or decompress the rar file in to a folder.
  2.  Launch the exe/app.

NOTES:

  • This game is still in development/for demo.
  • For UI navigation, use WASD / arrow keys / left stick to move and Enter / right button to select.
  • AI is still kinda wack. 

Available for now:

- Singleplayer

- Local Co - op

To be added:

- More customization

- More levels

- Online multiplayer

*Any feedbacks and suggestions would be very much appreciated!*
